name: 2nd Global Congress on Material Science & Engineering
content: I am very pleased to invite you to attend the 2nd Global Congress on Material Science & Engineering which will be held in July 09-10, 2020 at Rome Italy. Which incorporates provoke Keynote presentations, Oral presentations, Poster presentations and Exhibitions. The theme of the conference is “Exploring the Technological Advances in the field of Materials Science and Engineering”. It gives an awesome stage to covers a wide range of topics in the field of Material Science, Biomaterials, Nanotechnology, Materials Chemistry and Physics, Metallurgy and other related territories of Materials Science and Engineering. Materials Science 2020 is designed to stimulate growth of indigenous research and development of a wide range of materials and their applications through interactions among scientists, technologists and engineers engaged in research and technology development leading to applications and innovations of materials based on metals, alloys, ceramics, polymers, fibers and composites. and will be a unique platform where Scientists, Entrepreneurs, and Professionals from different parts of the world wide meet to exchange ideas and share their findings in the forefront of Materials knowledge and innovation.
